turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like to order four pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's a new pizzeria called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want all small size.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One pizza that's all cheese. One pizza that's just pepperoni. One pizza that's supreme. And one pizza with just onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 small pizzas, one cheese, one pepperoni, one supreme and one with onions, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $52, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, but can you make sure the pizza is thin crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can add that to your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you wanted thin crust for all 4 pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and will you be picking up, dining in or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Picking up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.
